root: ^Hello, and welcome to the Augmented Reality Computer Building Simulator.
^My name is CARL, your Computer-building Assistant and Robotic Lecturer. I will be your guide in this app. It's nice to meet you!
^This app uses augmented reality (abbreviated as AR) in order to simulate the computer building process.
^This app uses your phone's camera to create a virtual environment layered overtop the real world.
^Rather than tell you about AR, it may be easier to show you. Let's find a location to place down the desktop case.
^It's the rectangular box that houses all of the computer parts. When you think of a computer, you probably think of the case first!
^We'll use AR to place the case down in your world. Follow the instructions on screen and press the "place case" button once you find a good spot!
